name: Lee Cortez
text: Holds to his quote even if  something else arises.  Great Service, REALLY good prices and true to  his word. He backs up his work.

name: Vickie Unicornmom
text: Quinn was Polite and found out the problems right away. Doing all the paperwork that has to be done and will call as soon as he hears back from Car Shield.

name: Sue Szidon
text: great service , great price

name: Howard Cox
text:
Known Charlie for 20 + years.Had not done business with him in about 12. When i called him it was like we just spike last month.
A true southern gentlemen.
Great company and personal service.
Changing my purchase habbits to use him more often.

name: Kenneth Roach
text: Very busy, experienced automotive machinists, excellent machine work.  Prices are very reasonable.

name: Logan Smith
text: Absolutely fantastic work. I gave them a disaster of a block and head. Took a little bit but well worth the wait. Looks almost brand new. Great work to all who put time into it.

name: Carl Davis
text: Excellent service and knowledgeable staff, they helped me fix a head for an ATV that would have been replaced by most for 600$ for less than 20$

name: Jeff Atkins
text: Great services and great prices. Fantastic bunch of Guys that do great quality work! Highly recommended

name: David Turner
text: Miracle work on the heads! So far so 👍 and some really nice guys.

text: Great price and a pleasure to do business with. Great people!

name: Jon Adamson
text: Best place in Dothan Alabama

name: Jessica. R. Trawick
text: Charlie's does great work at amazing prices!

name: Joshua Jones
text: Great people

name: Craig Campbell
text: Dropped off my Jeep 4.2L head with these guys for a complete overhaul with a minor port job. Very friendly, knowledgeable, timely, and great prices. Not sure what else to say, picked up my head today and am very happy.

name: Rayvel Islas
text: Has the block of my engine for over 2 months, how's that fast? I call him ine time to ask about my engine he told me "let me go check I'll call you back in 5 mins" he never did I had to go to his shop to found about the crankshaft was somewhere else and every time I call the engine will be ready soon, and still nothing, I'm going to have to buy an engine so I can keep moving, SO NO, I DO NOT RECOMEND THIS PLACE

name: Alan Jordan
text: Use them on all my machine work never had a issue.

name: Krazy Kracker
text: Hot Anna lives behind here

text: We have been buying rebuilt heads from Charlie's since the 1980's. We have also sent them quite a few scarce or rare heads to have repaired or rebuilt. They are very professional and have the highest level of workmanship available.

name: Ken Mikkelson
text: Dan built us a 331 stroker engine for our 66 Mustang FB, the BEST! Every thing was done using the best parts and skill producing an awesome power plant... You even get a one year warranty... Could not be happier. If you need an engine Dutton Performance Engines is your place to go...

text: If you need machining. Dan is the one to go to been back 5 times already. Helps me with anything I need👍👍👍.

Highly recommend,  knows the 6.0 powerstroke good!

name: Hank Harbin
text: Talked to em yesterday on the phone bout replacing a water pump on my vehicle and they were really friendly and gave me the info I needed. Told me to bring my vehicle to em in the mornin and they would have it ready round 1 30. Got a phone call at 1 27 sayin my vehicle was ready. Didn't cost me an arm and leg and was very friendly

name: Josh Miller
text: Nice great work

name: Jonmichael Orr
text: It's all good

name: Jackson Files
text: Good performance

name: Brian Hollon
text: Went through Car Advice fleet services. I got there and they charged me for the work. Then they informed me they couldn’t do the alignment due to a few sugar ants in the inside of the car. They sent me on my way, and I have yet to be refunded the money for the alignment that never happened! So yeah! I’m extremely disappointed with all of it!! It’s one thing to give me an excuse like sugar ants, it’s another for my money to be taken and not given back.

resp.text: Hi Mr. Hollon. I am sorry you were dissatisfied we were unable to service your car today. We are more than happy to assist you after you take care of the issues we brought up regarding the condition of your car's interior. Thank you!

name: Vickie G Howard
text: Installed a new motor in my moms car window. They were very nice the shop was clean and well kept. The motor was installed very quickly. Would highly recommend. PS it was cheaper than the other 2 places we called.

Its the best place for restoration of vintage cars .

name: Sand Mountain Ballistics
text: Ledon does poor work. And he will not stand behind his work. I would take my engine literally any where else

name: josh whisenant
text: John a and Ladon always take care of what I need!

name: David
text: This place is run by honest folks that treat you right. The owner is a skilled professional. If you need a cylinder head decked, a block bored or a crank ground, this is the place to get it done right and for a fair price.

name: Ronnie
text: Tell John I said Hi

name: Andreanna Davis
text: They are absolutely wonderful! I took in my Dad’s 1993 Ford Lightning. We had been having trouble with it going dead and just not running right. Several other local mechanics had tried to fix it with little success. I read about Hesco and decided to give them a try. I’m so glad I did. They got Dad’s truck running perfectly! I will never let anyone else work on it again. They do a great job and great work! I just can’t thank them enough for all they did. Would recommend them highly to anyone.

name: Rick Clark
text: I bought a lotus and it was delivered with a flat tire.  Jeff came out to my house picked up the tire and brought it back the next day to put the tire on and check the pressure in the rest of the tires. He was happy to answer any question I had!  Amazing customer service!  A+!  I will be using them for the service of my car.

name: jeffrey vaughn
text: I grew up next door to Jeff. I remember a day when I looked out and saw a 2nd gen camaro with a blower sitting a foot out of the hood. It was Jeff. I was a kid and did the burnout hand signal..to which he happily obliged. Worked with his lil sis many years later and he still remembered. Genuinely thoughtful and kind dude who exudes knowledge.

name: Bailey Ike
text: The customer service is outstanding, the people working there feel authentic and give the impression they truly care.

name: Radioman
text:
Jeff @ HESCO is unparalleled in his infinite wisdom behind the wheel and under the hood of a car. He has been known to pull a rabbit out of a hat on many occasions. I would not hesitate to take any of my vehicles to him for any reason.
Thanks, Jeff-
Tim @ Rickwood Radio Service

name: Eric Morin
text: At last found a shop to work on my Mazda RX-8 R3 with a twin rotary. Honest diagnosis and job well done. Think it runs better than when I bought it! Thank you Jeff and crew!

resp.text: Thank you for the outstanding feedback, Eric! We are so glad that you were able to find a shop that fit your auto needs, we look forward to working with you and your RX-8 again!

name: Charles B Ireland
text: I have been taking my machine work to Hesco for many years. Best machine shop anywhere. Now that I no longer work on my own vehicles, I intend to entrust them with their care.

resp.text: Charles, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. It is a pleasure to work see you in our machine shop. We are so glad we have gained your long term trust! Let us know if there is anything we can assist you with!

name: Nichole Posten
text: As someone indicated, they do a lot of specialty high end vehicle work but it has been well worth the extra to know that the work is done right.  I have been taking my now 10yr old (beater) Jeep here for 8+ years and will take my new Subaru here.  Joe is great and always has the time to spend explaining anything to you.  He even took my husband and son around the shops to look at all of the cars there.

resp.text: Thank you for your loyalty over the years Nichole, we truly appreciate it!

name: Stephen Wilson
text: These guys do some of the best work in Birmingham. That being said, when you see the Ferraris and classic cars in the parking lot you know you are going to pay a price that matches their level of quality work. Don't let the abrasive or lack of communication keep you from at least getting a written quote from their shop. On a side note, get someone to show you around their facility because it is basically an ever changing museum of mechanical genius. Custom builds, daily drivers, etc it's a pretty cool spot in the heart of downtown. If all else fails, you can walk to Good People Brewery or Regions Park  and drink away your sorrows.

resp.text: Thank you for the good review, Stephen! We appreciate getting your feedback and we hope next time we can deliver a 5-star experience!

name: Lindsay Hobbs
text:
I have nothing but good things to say about Hesco and the people working there! My husband and I were driving from Utah to Atlanta when our car broke down in Birmingham. Even though they were busy, they fit us in and got us back on the road the next day! Not only did they fix our car, but they went above and beyond to make sure that we were taken care of while we were stuck in the city. They even called us a few days later to make sure we had made it to our destination safely and without any problems!
We are SO grateful for Jeff, Joe, and everyone else who took such good care of us! This was by far the best experience we have ever had with a mechanic, and would recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you for the excellent review, Lindsay! We are glad you arrived safely, and we can't thank you enough for all the kind words. Our goal is to provide our customers with an unbeatable experience every time!

name: Prentice Jones
text: One of my best friends works at this shop so I know they are an A+ shop because Warren is a very good tech.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review! We are so glad to have Warren on our team! We appreciate the great recommendation!

name: Jacob Hobbs
text: These are the kind of guys that would take their shirts off their backs to help you. Highly recommend to anyone who appreciates honest and high quality work!

resp.text: We appreciate the great review, Jacob. That is exactly who we strive to be. Thank you for your business, and we hope to see you again!

name: James Gavin
text: On a recent trip from Birmingham back to Atlanta my 2012 Hyundai Equus ran hot about 30 miles outside of Birmingham, we got off at exit 147 wound up having to get it towed back to Birmingham. I didn't know a mechanic in B'ham so I had it delivered to J.B. a Buick dealership, they inspected it for $309 and said that I at the least had a blown head gasket caused by a bad water pump and that it was going to cost me $2215  for them to break down the engine and make sure that there was no further damage with the engine,  and that it could be as much as $4500 to replace all the gaskets through out the engine. NOT TODAY!!! So I did a Google search and came across HESCO, the reviews were great, I spoke with Joe Molina and he arranged to have it tower to HESCO "DESPITE being in the middle of changing locations", they got it in checked it out, started it up, "No white smoke from the tail pipe", turned out to be the water pump, THAT's ALL. I can't recommend Joe Molina and the guys at HESCO Automotive highly enough, they are highly professional, extremely efficient, keep you informed at every juncture of the process, and very reasonable. I am telling ALL my friends and family to take their vehicles to HESCO Automotive. Thanks guys, this was a very stressful situation as I was having to take care of it from Atlanta, Joe you could not have been better.

resp.text: Thank you James! It is great to hear from you and glad we could help you out.  We want to make sure all of our costumes are taken care of and are aware of the repairs needed for their vehicle. We are glad you found us and we could located the problem to your water pump. We truly appreciate your recommendation. Give us a call if you have questions or need anything in the future!

name: Ron Denney
text: I had a bolt sheared off inside my BMW motorcycle wheel. I called Wesco from Hoover and explained the situation and that I lived 90 miles south in Dadeville, AL. I spoke with Joe on the phone. He said bring it in and they would see what they could do for me. They used an easy out to remove the bolt for me quickly and wouldn't even take any money for this service. Great people at WESCO!

resp.text: We really appreciate the excellent review, Ron. We are happy to help. Let us know if there is anything else we can help you with!

name: Ray Clark
text: I have a Z-3 and a 535i and would not let anyone else touch them in Birmingham.  I used to go to Tom Williams for items under warranty and they always found something to fix that did not need fixing.  Anything Joe, Jeff and his folks say, I trust completely.

resp.text: Ray - We cannot thank you enough for your business and the great review! We appreciate being able to work with you.

name: Dawn Brook
text: I took my wife's 07 Murano in for a few repairs and got the same great service as all the exotics Hesco works on. Great guys and service.

resp.text: Roy - Thank you for the great review! It is always a pleasure to be able to work with you and we cannot thank you enough for your business.

name: Katie munkus
text: I was very disappointed with this business. I had to have my car towed here the Wednesday before Thanksgiving. I was told that I would get a detailed estimate the following Monday. I was fine with that. When I called Monday I was told that they had already started replacing and fixing the damaged parts to my car without my permission and without my knowledge. So I specifically said please stop working on it until I get the detailed estimate I was promised and had looked it over. The next day I decided to have my car towed to a different shop that specializes in Volkswagen and Audi cars. When I called Hesco to tell them what I had decided they informed me that my car was almost completely finished. The owner made a decision without my permission yet again and without calling to inform me what was going on. I was highly disappointed that every decision made about my car was made without my input or knowledge. And that my request for them to stop the repairs was completely ignored. This business is very unprofessional and lacks the ability to communicate with their customers. I also feel that I was taken advantage of because I am a woman. Not to mention the repairs done to my car were done wrong. I ended up having to have all the transmission fluid drained and replaced bc they used a brand that is not recommended for German cars. I also had to have the tires rebalanced and aligned bc Hesco didn't properly do that either. I do not recommend this business to anyone.

name: Douglas Smith
text: Apparently Jim Burke Subaru won't work on modified Subaru's (so basically every WRX)... Hesco came through and even purchased the updated software so that they could diagnose my car. Skip Jim Burke and take your modified Subie here.

resp.text: Thank you for the great feedback Douglas, we are glad we were able to help when others fell short.

name: T Adams
text: These guys are truly great!

resp.text: Thank you, Rai for the 5-stars and kind words! We greatly appreciate it.

name: John Waldo
text: Don't take your Eaton supercharged vehicle here.

name: SimbaJKU
text: Great shop for all your automotive needs. Jon and his staff of assassin's know how to turn your mail crawler into a fully capable monster

name: Joshua Williams
text: Best in the business!!  Great customer service and even better prices!!  Highly recommend and everyone should also check out the website!!!!

name: tim Martz
text: Called 6 times over 3 weeks to have front and rear gears installed in truck.. Talked to same lady every time.  Keeps "forgetting" to call me back with prices.. Really thinking now they cant handle it.

name: swingingforfences swingingforfences
text: Excellent place for parts and service

name: Steven Hoff (Gigabyte)
text: Did a great job balancing my wheels for me. Great service and knowledge there.

name: Danny Brittian
text: I have reached out to this place numerous Times to get work done and they always tell me they are too busy and suggest somewhere else to do business. They were very rude and act as though they do not want to support the community in which they should want to serve.

resp.text: What were you wanting to get done?  I know currently we are booking about two weeks out on service work.

name: Scotty Lovelady
text: Jon and his team are top notch!

name: Chase Stephens
text: Great people, Great variety, Great Patience. Chris, Jeff, and Jon all shared their wealth of knowledge and insight. Top notch guys that do top notch work! Projects big or small this is the place to go. I’ve taken both my truck and Jeep for different things, extremely pleased with everything I’ve had done. If they don’t have what you want in stock, they will work to get it. Check out some of their builds.... they speak for themselves.

name: Clifton Bailey
text: They didn't act like they wanted my business.

resp.text: Im the owner of Rpmextreme. Was there something you needed? I never want any customers to feel like we didn't want their business. As a small business owner its important to me to be sure all my customers feel like they received a higher quality experience.

name: Curt Dusterhoff
text: Tried for over a month to get an estimate on an ls swap in my lj.  Never could get an estimate.  Didnt seem like they wanted my business so I just gave up.

name: Tim Brewis
text: RPM installed my goose neck hitch.  Did a great job at a competitive price.  Turnaround was quick.  I would use them again.

name: Shelby Renner
text: I drive all the way there from southern Illinois for a motor swap in my jeep, a 5.3. It only took about a week for them to get the job done, while they had many other projects going. My jeep runs perfect and is badass now thanks to RPM extreme!!!

name: Robert Wrinkle
text: Good food always and nice people who work thr and ry

name: Mount Zion Offroad
text: These guys are great!  They helped me with a HEMI JK Computer problem.  They were quick, friendly and willing to help!

name: Jason Jones
text: Jon tuned my 2013 JK on his trip to California. Thanks for taking the time out of your busy schedule!  It was easy and he was fast. Fixed my 3-4 shift and gave me more gains than I can list.  Loaded my Flash Paq 87 tune and it drives better than new!  Can't wait to try the other tunes. Thanks again! Highly recommend if you are having the same problem  with your JK when driving uphill.

resp.text: We love helping where we can.

name: Darrell Heimann
text: Have the upmost respect for the very professional staff at this business. Very knowledgeable about Jeep's and are willing to listen to and address your requirements.

name: S Hurley (Grayhemi16)
text: Not just for jeeps. Had them install some relocation brackets on my lowered ram 1500, did great work and at a very good price.

resp.text: Yes its true we do more than just Jeeps. We have a lot of experienced techs in the back and they love a challenge.

name: Robert Thompson
text: Very knowledgeable

name: Foster Stevens
text: Only place in St. Clair county that could actually fix my motor. Others wanted to replace it at twice what I paid to fix it. It took longer than expected by 2 weeks, but satisfied with the results. Now if they can find or replace my center wheel cover I will be happy.

name: Daniel Box
text: I'm gonna start this story at the beginning so I dont leave out any details. I'm a single father of two boys the reason I tell you this is because I told them and I think that makes what they done to me worse. Yes I'm talking about premier tire and Auto on 231. The battery lite and brake lite came on and it was losing power. I got the battery checked and it was good. So I take it to premier thinking it was the alternator which he SAID he checked it and it was bad it would be 200$ for the alternator and two hours labor at around 110 an hour. I agreed to this and the following morning when I called to check on things she tells me it took him a hour to get the hood up. (All you had to do was pull the cable and pull up on the hood. So simple my daughter could do it) so they charged me 1 hr in labor just to get my hood open?? They already had the alternator so I couldn't back out . I wish I would have cause who really wants someone to work on your vehicle when they cant even get the hood up.. RED FLAG!! Anyway they got the alternator on she said it took them 5 hrs so I was getting a good deal but keep in mind the 110 she charged to open the hood. I get home the next morning on my way to work it was doing the same thing so I took it back. She said he would put it on the machine and get it fixed. They had it for a weak cause she said there were people ahead of me which I understood. A week later she calls and said that it was upn sensor or something like that behind the steering wheel I had to take it to a dealer. Then she goes on to tell me i owed 225$ for his diagnostic but wait now I've paid over 800$ and my van is still doing the exact same thing. So when i called the dealer the thing that he diagnosed it to be that the van would not even start and it does start. Now I'm 800 dollars out and have to take it somewhere else. They done me wrong plain and simple

name: M
text: The mechanics here are extremely knowledgeable, and they offer very fair prices. They are easy to deal with and had my car fixed in one afternoon.

name: Wanda Hogan
text: Very knowledgeable and courteous  was great to see good customer service

name: Mary Jane
text: Good place to get your car looked at!!

name: Derrick Johnson
text: Sent 2001 e250 van for axal bearings evidently didn,t do what they should have done and expected rest of rear end still have noises from rear end will take it some where else charged me 455.00$ and didn't fix problem ask me for mechanic in Pell City i,'ll tell u where not to go!

name: Stephanie Booth
text: Fair prices,good work done on time.

name: KC Stefaniak

Quick and very professional.  Fair prices and did not do any upselling. A breath of fresh air.
Highly recommend.
Thanks guys

name: Annette RathSamec

We were traveling and encountered a shock issue on the towed vehicle. Without an appointment, they put it on a rack in the morning. They ordered the parts and replaced the shocks that afternoon. They even gave us a loaner car for the time it took.
Super super nice. Thanks To Steve in Service!

name: Danny Geary
text: John was very professional at his courtesy and quick working skills at the tire and lube. He deserves some kind of accommodation o atleast a raise because he makes Watkins look like the best Ford Dealership there is.... THANKS John and thanks Ronnie Watkins

name: Jim Kerkhoff
text: Excellent and quick service every time.  I get all my tires, brakes, and services done there on my Honda.  Steve, John, and the crew are always willing to help and are very friendly!  Thanks Again guys!

name: Marilyn King
text: The man that ran The Tint Shop was very nice and explaining everything about the tint illegal and legal tint I would recommend him to anyone

name: Conchetta Edwards
text: They charge to much their not reasonable I believe they find any and everything for you to spend big money im finding another mechanic i wouldn't recommend this place they fix my problem real great and good but they charge to much for me no thanks

text:
Awesome customer service and very VERY knowledgeable folks.

Old school folks with solid complete engine  building skills and above all the correct high end equipment to do it right and precise.

name: Enrique Gomez
text: Keith and the all the guys are very Knowledgeable and the Customer Service is Absolutely Awesome!

name: Timothy Hunter
text: Great place! I had them rebuild a 6.0 ls motor for me. They did amazing work and will definitely return there again for future work.

name: Greg Mize

name: Brian Buck
text: carried my truck in for an intake leak ,fixed it in a timely manner,  drove to work and wouldnt start. mechanic said whe he put the diatributor back in it felt funny , ended up replacing timing chain, pushrods and valves in heads . truck ran perfect when i carried it in , after i spent 2,000$ on it . took it home , ran great , but now its pouring oil out the timing chain cover . wouldnt take my bicycle to get air put in the tire !!

name: J L
text: Always willing to help. Great prices. Excellent service.

name: Teresa Short
text: Great people who do great work!!

name: Tami Reeves Rushforth
text: These guys are the kindest and most hard working! So glad to find a place I can trust.

name: Timothy Brown
text: Mr Don and the other staff and mechanics are very nice and professional. They do great work at an affordable rate!!!

name: Linda H. Nelms
text: They are so kind!!!  They're good honest Christians, who work for a living just like the rest of us. But, they are truly good and kind people and they want you to be satisfied with their work. Prices are great!! Love 'em!!

name: Brittany Goldberg

name: Brenda Proctor
text: They took care of my problem quickly and didn't cost alot

text: The people were really friendly. They tried to up sell me a few times even though I just wanted a tire fixed but they did the work quickly and were friendly.

text: This is a business that handles business when it needs to be handled and there staff is friendly and very educated on doing work on tractors and any other work mechanically that you may need them to do! Over all this garage is the best all around garage to use for any mechanic work you may need done!!

name: J H
text: Top of the line equipment and customer service. Courtney and Keith were great. I would recommend them for all of your landscaping and agricultural equipment needs.

name: David Ross
text: Great people. Quality service.

name: kelley Mitchell
text: Lady at desk didn't know what she was talking about 😂 but I was charged right in the end

name: Robert Mcdonough
text: I bought a classic truck from a previous owner in Florida and moved into the neighborhood of Stephen's garage. Once day I decided to take my truck into Stephen's for a new set of ball joints. Later that day they called me to inform me the previous owner had welded my ball joints to my LCA. That call just probably saved my life and someone else on the road.  Good job guys

name: Tonya Kidd
text: In and out on a timely manner

name: Matty Puppy
text:
Helpful, promptly fixing my things, even rushing to finish a belt replacement before closing time as I needed the vehicle the next morning.

I came in recently with a small issue. They pulled the bad part, found they hadn't a replacement or one in stock nearby, and gave it to me.

They offered to order one, but advised that ordering it myself would cost less, as it would circumvent their own overhead charges. They charged me nothing for the hour of work it took them to get to the part.

Overall honest and helpful across my 3 visits, with more coming.

name: jkgame club upshaw
text: Great customer service.

name: Michelle Williams
text: Fast friendly service 👌👍

name: Pattie Mitchell
text: Some employees are very helpful and others are just plain rude.

name: Connie Lillich
text: Very decent prices and friendly staff.

name: Ria Henderson
text: I went to have a leak looked and even though I didn't get my car serviced I was treated with respect and given honest results to my issue.

name: Benny King
text: Great service and at a fair price.

name: Daniel Hawkins
text: Absolutely incredible service! My 06 Tacoma broke down in Luverne as I was driving back home to Florida from Tennessee (on a Friday afternoon!). The U joints in the drive shaft all had to be replaced, the front one had completely failed and the front part of the shaft was completely detached. My truck was towed to their shop at 1pm and I was back on the road by 2:40pm! Just outstanding service and fair rates. If you're anywhere near Luverne takes your vehicle to Stephen's Garage! They'll definitely take care of you!

name: Melissa Williamson
text: Great service and the mechanics do good work. Fair priced and that's always a blessing.

name: Tiffany Kidd
text: They are friendly and helpful

name: B.J Killings
text: The people are nice

name: Heather Simmons
text: Today my car was making a terrible sound to the point I was scared to drive it. I called this service and they came to me and helped me fix the problem! Very friendly people.

name: Robert Webb
text: Poor service.

name: dan cramer
text: Great service!!!! Fits perfect and my engine now runs great.... Only place in Alabama or Georgia to have it in stock and was 90 dollars cheaper than O'Reilly's

name: Sam Collier
text: They did an excellent job resurfacing my Volvo cylinder head for $60.. it's like a mirror finish I was very impressed.. same day turn around

name: Ryan McWhorter
text: Fast responsible reworking of my tractor's flywheel. Great work. Helped me get it by weekend.

name: Bobby Schulz
text: It a wonderful place of god!

name: Joe Mcclendon
text: Great place to get your head work done

name: William C. Hardy
text: Great guys.

name: Jeff High
text: Fast service and reasonably priced.  I would diffently use again.

name: The Smitty's Garage
text: Great price, very kind, and fast service. A fading trade keep these businesses open.

name: Gorman Cassidy
text: Great people!

name: DJ super Chris Walker
text: Johnny is the best
